section.title: Description
section.p: This tool is used to encrypt a particular password with a specified passphrase. This tool is available on the OAME nodes atÂ /bin/fpm-password.

note.p: When encrypted parameters are used and must be decrypted before they are used, these parameters are decrypted automatically without using this tool.

section.p: The password is encrypted in accordance with the following:

li.p: The input password must contain at least eight characters.
The input password must not contain prohibited characters and combinations.

note.p: Usage of the fpm-password tool is only available on the OAME VMs post-instantiate. Configuration of the snmp/users/v3 parameter can only be done after an installation or software upgrade.

table.title: Characters and combinations prohibited in passwords

section.title: Syntax
section.p: where <passphrase> is the <AES-pass> in plain text.

note.p: The passphrase to decrypt the password must be the same that was used to encrypt that password.

row.entry: Encrypts a particular password with a specified passphrase.
Decrypts a particular password with a specified passphrase.

section.title: Example
section.p: The following encrypted value is generated:

note.p: The output is shown on the console only.

fig.codeblock:
[tpaadmin@sps-ig-oame-1 ~]$ fpm-password en test@password testpassphrase U2FsdGVkX18nlouweC7yc/Lh0Mug4MResz2rp9eF+cM=
[tpaadmin@sps-ig-oame-1 ~]$ fpm-password de U2FsdGVkX18nlouweC7yc/Lh0Mug4MResz2rp9eF+cM= testpassphrase test@password
